mapper.select: SELECT us.uid,us.uname,cs.courses_name,b.batch_name FROM users us INNER JOIN users_batch ub ON us.uid = ub.uid INNER JOIN batch b ON ub.batch_id = b.batch_id INNER JOIN users_teach_courses ut ON us.uid=ut.uid INNER JOIN courses cs ON ut.courses_id=cs.courses_id WHERE us.uid IN(SELECT utc.uid FROM users u INNER JOIN users_classs uc ON u.uid=uc.uid INNER JOIN classs_courses cc ON uc.classs_id=cc.classs_id INNER JOIN users_teach_courses utc ON cc.courses_id=utc.courses_id WHERE u.uid=#{uid} AND b.batch_name=#{bname} )
